Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Significantly more weight gain occurred with olanzapine than with risperidone : the increase in weight at 4 months relative to baseline weight was 17 . 3 % ( 95 % CI = 14 . 2 % - 20 . 5 % ) with olanzapine and 11 . 3 % ( 95 % CI = 8 . 4 % - 14 . 3 % ) with risperidone .

Let's think step by step.

1. Olanzapine: This is a chemical entity. It is an atypical antipsychotic medication used to treat schizophrenia and related disorders.
2. Risperidone: This is another chemical entity. It is also an atypical antipsychotic medication used to treat schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, and irritability in autistic disorder.

These are the only two chemical entities mentioned in the paragraph.
